articles.title: Earth is rotating faster, completes rotation in less than 24 hours; sets record for shortest day - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: The shortest month on record for the planet since the 1960s occurred in 2020. The shortest day ever was recorded on July 19 of that year. It was shorter than a usual 24-hour day by 1.47 milliseconds.
articles.content: The shortest month on record for the planet since the 1960s occurred in 2020. The shortest day ever was recorded on July 19 of that year. It was shorter than a usual 24-hour day by 1.47 milliseconds.… [+2308 chars]

articles.title: 'My heart is heavy': Star Trek alumni and others react to death of Nichelle Nichols, who played Lt Uhura - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: "My heart is heavy, my eyes shining like the stars you now rest among, my dearest friend," tweeted George Takei, who played Sulu alongside Nichols in Star Trek.

articles.title: U.S. House Speaker Pelosi begins Asia tour, no mention of Taiwan - Reuters.com
articles.description: U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi starts a tour of four Asian countries on Sunday, her office said, without mentioning Taiwan amid intense speculation she might visit the self-ruled island claimed by China.
